caption.p: Intra‐ and Inter‐Species Transmission of Human Coronaviruses. Red, yellow, green, blue, brown, and purple arrows represent the transmission of MERS‐CoV, SARS‐CoV, NL63, HKU1, OC43, and 229E, respectively, between bats, camels, cows, humans, and masked palm civets (shown in a legend on the side of the figure). Unbroken arrows represent confirmed transmission between the two species in question, and broken arrows represent suspected transmission (Copyright permission @ 2016 Elsevier Ltd. 30).
